metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3482 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An improper access control issue in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsfrom 11.3 prior to 15.3.5, 15.4 prior to 15.4.4, and 15.5 prior to 15.5.2allowed an unauthorized user to see release names even when releases we setto be restricted to project members only

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
